title: The Naked kiss [DVD]
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Institutional care - United States

description: Written, produced and directed by Samuel Fuller "The Naked Kiss" is a low-budget, tabloid melodrama. Its main character, a prostitute, wants to change her ways and ends up working in a hospital helping the handicapped. This moralistic and exploitative film is a unique look at outcasts showing the harsh realities that exist behind a seemingly civilized society. Outrageous in its time "The Naked Kiss" is a strange mixture of the moralistic and the perverse existing in suburbia. Cinematography by Stanley Cortez. Cast include Constance Towers, Anthony Eisley, Michael Dante and Virginia Grey.
